description: This is a Kotlin source file defining a singleton object 'MockContentRepository' which functions as an in-memory mock data repository for a media streaming application. It provides sample media content, categories, channels, electronic program guide (EPG), and related operations, primarily for testing or development purposes.

classes.name: ContentItem
classes.description: Represents a media content item such as a movie or show.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: Represents a category of media content.

classes.name: Program
classes.description: Represents a TV program or episode in the EPG.

methods.name: getFeatured
methods.description: Retrieves a list of featured media items.

methods.name: getCategoryItems
methods.description: Retrieves media items belonging to a specified category.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search for media items by query string.

methods.name: detailById
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a media item or channel by its ID.

methods.name: getChannels
methods.description: Retrieves a list of available channels.

methods.name: getEPGForChannel
methods.description: Gets the electronic program guide for a specific channel.

methods.name: getLiveEPG
methods.description: Retrieves the live EPG data for all channels.

methods.name: saveResumePosition
methods.description: Saves the resume position for a specific media item.

methods.name: getResumePosition
methods.description: Retrieves the saved resume position for a media item.

methods.name: clearResume
methods.description: Clears the saved resume position for a media item.
